SELECT MS_LIST_ITEM_ID,
KIND, DISP_NAME, IS_VISIBLE, ALWAYS_SELECTED, CLASS_NAME, PROPERTY_NAME, WIDTH, DISPLAY_ORDER, MASTER_NAME, MASTER_PROPERTY_NAME, ALIGNMENT,
DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_USER_ID, RENEW_DATE, TS
FROM MS_LIST_ITEM
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND KIND = :KIND
ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER
